greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Total number of ON cells at stage 2n of two-dimensional 5-neighbor outer totalistic cellular automaton defined by "Rule 451".
comment: The number of ON cells at stage 2n+1 is infinite.
reference: S. Wolfram, A New Kind of Science, Wolfram Media, 2002; pp. 173-175.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Illustration of first 24 generations
Index entries for sequences related to cellular automata
mathematica: Map[Function[Apply[Plus, Flatten[ #1]]], CellularAutomaton[{ 451, {2, {{0, 2, 0}, {2, 1, 2}, {0, 2, 0}}}, {1, 1}}, {{{1}}, 0}, 130]] (* then take every other term *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 27 2014
